Name: ZigZagging Ski
About the game: Do you remember the last time you were on vacation? Welcome to the world of ski. The ZigZagging Ski is a casual game that will teach you how to combine the useful with the pleasant. Your mission will be to relax and to conquer the most beautiful picturesque places, where not everyone can access. With the help of the zig zag technique you will be able to maintain your balance and avoid obstacles in front such as yetis, fir trees and other things. Get ready right now for a new unforgettable experience! Game Features : - No way back - Mouse playing - Gifts with accessories - Collect stars
